list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (in the first person) expressing the future tense.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: this time next week I shall be in Scotland
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Lần này vào tuần tới tôi sẽ ở Scotland

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: expressing a strong assertion or intention.
used in questions indicating offers or suggestions.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: shall I send you the book?
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi sẽ gửi cho bạn cuốn sách?
